title.no: Levin Model 27 gjennom en Korg MS-20
title.en: Levin Model 27 through a Korg MS-20

content.no:
Sender lyden fra en Levin orkestergitar gjennom en Korg MS-20 External Signal Processor (ESP). Gitaren er stemt ned til C#.
Signalkjede for gitar: Levin Model 27, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Ceriatone Centura Professional Overdrive, Fjærklang og tremolo fra Fender Twin Reverb, Shure SM57 og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Signalkjede for synth: Levin Model 27 inn i Korg MS-20 External Signal Processor (ESP), Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Vox AC15H1TV, Shure SM57 og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
content.en:
Running a Levin archtop guitar through a Korg MS-20 External Signal Processor (ESP). The guitar is tuned down to C#.
Guitar signal chain: Levin Model 27, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Ceriatone Centura Professional Overdrive, Spring reverb and tremolo from Fender Twin Reverb, Shure SM57 and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Synth signal chain: Levin Model 27 into Korg MS-20 External Signal Processor (ESP), Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Vox AC15H1TV, Shure SM57 and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.

thumbnailDescription: A Levin Model 27 archtop guitar being played

title.no: Synth solo med Sequential Circuits Pro-One
title.en: Synth solo with Sequential Circuits Pro-One

content.no:
Synth solo med Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer over en 5/4 låtidé.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effekter: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Synth solo with Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer over a 5/4 groove.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effects: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer being played

title.no: Synth-jam med Korg MS-20, Logan String Melody II og Arturia DrumBrute
title.en: Synth jam with Korg MS-20, Logan String Melody II and Arturia DrumBrute

content.no:
Senkvelds synth-jam spilt inn med en Roland PA-120 mikser og en Fostex X-28H 4-spors kassettopptaker.
Instruments: Arturia DrumBrute, Korg MS-20 og Hohner / Logan String Melody II.
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fjærklang, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Late night synth jam recorded through a Roland PA-120 mixer to a Fostex X-28H 4-track cassette recorder.
Instruments: Arturia DrumBrute, Korg MS-20 and Hohner / Logan String Melody II.
Effects: Roland PA-120 spring reverb, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Mixer: Roland PA-120.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Korg MS-20 synthesizer and a Logan String Melody II synthesizer being played
